name: FileDocument
desc: A document model definition used to serialize documents to and from file contents.

items.name: init(configuration: Self.ReadConfiguration) throws
items.desc: Creates a file document from the given configuration.

items.name: static var readableContentTypes: [UTType]
items.desc: The types the document is able to open.

items.name: typealias ReadConfiguration
items.desc: The configuration for reading document contents.

items.name: func fileWrapper(configuration: Self.WriteConfiguration) throws -> FileWrapper
items.desc: Serializes the document to file contents for a specified configuration.

items.name: static var writableContentTypes: [UTType]
items.desc: The types the document is able to save or export to.

items.name: typealias WriteConfiguration
items.desc: The configuration for serializing document contents.
